title: EXCLUSIVE G7 warns Russia of 'massive consequences' if Ukraine attacked -draft statement
content:
1. EXCLUSIVE G7 warns Russia of 'massive consequences' if Ukraine attacked -draft statement  Reuters
  2. G7 ministers seek to present a 'show of unity' against Russia  Al Jazeera English
  3. G7 Warns Russia of 'Massive Consequences' if Ukraine Attacked - Draft Statement  U.S. News & World Report
  4. Editorial: G7 nations must stand by Ukraine and hope Putin sees sense  The Independent
  5. 'More and more convergence' with allies on costs to Russia if they invade Ukraine, says State Department official  CNN
contentSnippet:

localize.title: EXCLUSIVE G7、ウクライナが攻撃された場合、ロシアに「大規模な結果」を警告 -声明案
独家报道：七国集团警告俄罗斯，如果乌克兰受到攻击，将面临 "巨大后果"--声明草案
獨家報道：七國集團警告俄羅斯，如果烏克蘭受到攻擊，將面臨 "巨大後果"--聲明草案
